title: Hypnotic ecstasy and Quantum hypnosis on Dr. Marco Paret's non-verbal hypnosis masterclass
description:
Dr. Marco Paret demonstrates strong hypnotic ecstasy and quantum hypnosis with his student at his masterclass. He used Magnetic passes and quantum elements. The woman hands took a mudra position, which is common for the hypnotic state of ecstasy. Every move and position of the body has its meaning and it's beneficial for the liberating process. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
